event.title: FSFE in FrosCon in St. Augustin, Germany

body.p: The FSFE will be present in the Free and Open Source Software Conference with a booth, a talk, and a workshop. Lina Ceballos, Project Manager, will present 'REUSE: Making copyright and licensing compliance easier'.
Florian Snow will give an Upcycling Android workshop, showing to people how they can flash phones and install a Free Software operating system.
